Introduction
------------

This bot helps people from all around the Kyrgyzstan get access to the vast amount of data about mobile devices without making
their hands dirty. It works on Telegram - a very convinient and user-friendly messenger. This bot is capable of getting
information about mobile devices from different sources. It also has some additional functionality, you can read all about this bot in the 
following links:
